# averageSuspendedMemory

**Instance Property**

The average amount of memory in use by the app when it’s suspended.

## Declaration

```swift
var averageSuspendedMemory: MXAverage<UnitInformationStorage> { get }
```

## Measuring memory use

- **peakMemoryUsage**: The largest amount of memory used by the app.

items.description: The largest amount of memory used by the app.
